content: though he may be a bit fiercer this falcon would never hurt a fly since his wings aren t functioning there is no chance of him making a big mess while flying in the house this pattern has not been tested but i have done my very best to make sure it is accurate and easy to follow to make this falcon you will need yarn- 2 colors feathers claws and beak hook- i used an e hook which is 3 5 eyes - 10 mm safety eyes polyfil stuffing tapestry needle for assembly and weaving in ends wire- 15 gauge aluminum wire or a thinner wire doubled over thank you so much for taking the time to check out my pattern i hope that you really enjoy making this falcon
